name: Louka the Baby Elephant
description:
Join Louka on his quest to find back his mom and dad. Watch out for the snakes and enjoy lot's of bananas!

Xbox controller

ButtonActionAShoot banana
YJumpBContinue to next dialogSTARTGo to menu

Mouse and keyboard

Button Action CTRLShoot banana SpaceJump ALTContinue to next dialog EscapeGo to menu
